text:
This little build file

<project name="test" default="noop">
<description>
This buildfile is used to build the foo subproject within 
the large, complex bar project.
</description>
  <target name="noop" />
</project>

creator: steve_l@iseran.com

text:
This is another of the build-with-jikes-1.15 bugs; the box I'm using had 
build.compiler set to jikes in ant-opts, so all ant builds were breaking.

This is just the simplest build file which exhibits the problem I have met so 
far.

...maybe we should doc this 'dont build ant with jikes1.15'?
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
